name: DOC_LAB_CONSENT_PROC
description: This table contains clinical consents for a patient's sensitive procedures.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the document record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the sensitive procedure associated with the patient's clinical consent.
